computers.name: Computer Terminal
computers.description: This is a 'dumb terminal' with only limited processing power. It serves as an interface to a more powerful computer such as a ship's computer or planetary network. Terminals range in size depending on their control method - a holographic display terminal can be much smaller than one with a physical keyboard and screen.
computers.special: Serves as an interface to a more powerful computer.

computers.name: Mainframe
computers.description: By the standards of its Tech Level, the mainframe is a very sophisticated and powerful computer, generally used by militaries and corporations for tasks beyond the abilities of more generalized computers. A mainframe has much of its mass dedicated to cooling and power supply.
computers.special: By the standards of its Tech Level, the mainframe is a very sophisticated and powerful computer.

computers.name: Mainframe
computers.description: By the standards of its Tech Level, the mainframe is a very sophisticated and powerful computer, generally used by militaries and corporations for tasks beyond the abilities of more generalized computers. A mainframe has much of its mass dedicated to cooling and power supply, and will generally be accessed by computer terminals.
computers.special: By the standards of its Tech Level, the mainframe is a very sophisticated and powerful computer.

computers.name: Mainframe
computers.description: By the standards of its Tech Level, the mainframe is a very sophisticated and powerful computer, generally used by militaries and corporations for tasks beyond the abilities of more generalized computers. A mainframe has much of its mass dedicated to cooling and power supply, and will generally be accessed by computer terminals.
computers.special: By the standards of its Tech Level, the mainframe is a very sophisticated and powerful computer.

computers.name: Portable Computer
computers.description: A portable computer is a computer system with considerable processing power, yet able to be easily carried - in today's world, this covers laptops and tablets of all sizes. It is more powerful than a computer terminal, and can be used without access to a network.
